member.name: DSSSEED
member.summary: The DSSSEED structure holds the seed and counter values that can be used to verify the primes of the DSS public key.

member.name: DSSSEED.counter
member.summary: A DWORD containing the counter value. If the counter value is 0xFFFFFFFF, the seed and counter values are not available.

member.name: DSSSEED.seed
member.summary: A BYTE string containing the seed value.
